/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on the records available from MIB, including
types of records available at MIB
who may request MIB records
MIB fees
information required for an MIB request
address for MIB
, and
notifying the claimant of MIB records
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section B - Obtaining Merchant Marine Service Records
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section B
